sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNPRIVACYLOG ( REQUST_ID , INQIRE_DT , SRVC_NM , INQIRE_INFO , RQESTER_ID , RQESTER_IP ) VALUES ( #requestId# , sysdate , #serviceName# , #inquiryInfo# , #requesterId# , #requesterIp# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , TO_CHAR(a.INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS INQIRE_DT , a.SRVC_NM , a.INQIRE_INFO , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.REQUST_ID = #requestId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.REQUST_ID ,TO_CHAR(a.INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS INQIRE_DT , a.SRVC_NM , a.INQIRE_INFO , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
a.INQIRE_INFO LIKE '%' || #searchWord# || '%'
a.INQIRE_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#searchBeginDate# || '000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#searchEndDate# || '235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
ORDER BY a.INQIRE_DT DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(a.REQUST_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
a.INQIRE_INFO LIKE '%' || #searchWord# || '%'
a.INQIRE_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#searchBeginDate# || '000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#searchEndDate# || '235959', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
